INBUMEXA.MX.summary: INBURMEX, S.A. de CV INVESTMENT COMPANY EQUITY (INBUMEX) (the "Company" or the "Fund") is an open investment company whose objective is to offer investors the option to invest in a portfolio consisting of investment assets that allow replicate the Affects of Prices and Quotations ("CPI". The base to be used as a reference for calculating the performance is CPI, less the costs incurred in terms of the series in question. The company must maintain a beta whose value ranges between 0.95 and 1.05 units, between the CPI and its share price, considering the effect last hundred observations.

PRINRVAA.MX.long_name: Principal RV A1 SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
PRINRVAA.MX.summary: The Fund will invest primarily in shares of Mexican companies in a direct way, through partnerships and investment vehicles that replicate the behavior of Mexican equity indices (non-leveraged ETFs whose underlying will be consistent with the Fund's investment regime and are registered in the national registry of values or in the SIC of the Bolsa Mexicana de Valores). It stays invested at least at 80% in actions, its objective being to stay close to 100%; therefore 20% may be invested also in shares of Mexican companies or national debt securities denominated in pesos. It is not the objective of the Fund be invested in debt instruments, this will be only for the purposes necessary to carry out adjustments in the composition or integration of the equity fund portfolio.

VECTINDA.MX.long_name: Vector Fondo Ãndice SA de CV S.I.R.V. A
VECTINDA.MX.summary: The Fund will invest primarily in shares of em-Mexican dams, invested will be maintained at least at 80% shares, his goal being to stay close to 100%; If the 20% may be invested in shares of Mexican companies or debt instruments, although it is not the objective of the Fund to be invested in debt instruments, it will be only with the intention to carry out adjustments in the composition or integration of the equity fund portfolio, for example, when the CPI (index of prices and Co-tizaciones) of the BMV (Bolsa Mexicana de Valores) changes its compositionThis happens the month of February of each year, that could change or reset by market situations or situation to consideration of own BMV and criteria of selection and composition of the CPI as well as the review and permanence of the sample.
